Articles.Content:
Hey, since we already have a mod that covers the Star Trek starships, I was wondering...

could someone please make the ships from the old tv series and cartoon movies: Space Battleship Yamato season 1 through 3 and its cartoon movies through Final Yamato? I really love this show and I think it would be absolutely amazing to have these in the game (weapons of course don't have to work, but just a fun item to have in-game)

Reference image for those who are unfamiliar with the BBY-01 *Yamato*:

![10185348t2.jpg](http://www.1999.co.jp/itbig18/10185348t2.jpg)

I hope someone would be willing to make a mod of this! It is one of my favorite starships and I would love to have Jeb (gasp) captain it in my game! I'd make it myself...if I knew how to model and texture ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

- - - Updated - - -

Also, some of the iconic enemy ships like this one would be great:

![ce77e3662c046f7b40aa96af7da5537d.jpg](https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/736x/ce/77/e3/ce77e3662c046f7b40aa96af7da5537d.jpg)
Can anyone make these for me?

It's on the scope of a professional project to model that in a near perfect representation.

Someone might do it for free (and hotpockets) but I wouldn't hold my breath.

P.S. Desler did nothing wrong.

Modelling that kind of stuff is a bit insane. I say you can try being creative with what we have, like putting together pieces of [BDArmoury](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85209-0-25-BDArmory-v0-7-1-1-Dev-Thread-Dec-9) (which has cannon turret) and [Lack Luster Lab](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/102237-0-25-LLL-Lack-Luster-Labs-%28Sci-fi-flying-boxes%29-LLL-13-03DE2014) for some large scale pieces. [OPT](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/97525-WIP-Large-Diameter-Space-Plane-Parts) may also help. Though an accurate representation is kind of out of scope.

> 
> P.S. Desler did nothing wrong.

Too true! In fact, in the original series, he ended up becoming a friend of Earth and of the Yamato

it can be done

![Fuior6G.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/Fuior6G.png?1)

- - - Updated - - -

thing is..where would the docking port be? Ive watched the whole series..where would you guys put it?

- - - Updated - - -

We could scale it up a bit 

![V9ZLnGX.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/V9ZLnGX.png?1)

- - - Updated - - -

![koMYSEi.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/koMYSEi.png?1)
As far as docking ports...Do you mean for the fighters? or for the ship itself?
either

I know that in the tv show, they lowered a door at the end just in front (or behind) the sub light engines to either pickup or launch its main fighter forces. I'm kind of wondering if it would be possible to create a pseudo-docking port but the fighters "disappear" until you are ready to launch them again via a menu command. Anyone know if this is possible? For the main ship...I recall that when it was in dry dock, it sat in sort of a cradle...I suppose that the "redshirt" third bridge might be a viable senior docking port. I have also seen sort of a brdge extended between ships that connect, I think, just ahead of the observation deck on the bow.
Ill play around with it and we will see what becomes of it
Ok, when you are about ready to put out the first alpha for testing, it would be best to create a new thread for it in the Addon Development area (don't forget to get a license for the mod)
To do it right, you'll also need a mod to change the Kerbal pants to flares and add a funky disco soundtrack. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> To do it right, you'll also need a mod to change the Kerbal pants to flares and add a funky disco soundtrack. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

OH! We gonna do all of that! Ideas just keep-a-comin ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I told Sampa That I was gonna give it a shot...and thats exactly what I intend to do.

progress has been slow due to alot of activity here at my home. weddings,friends,family. The hickup im having is the normals in the mesh were all scrambled up so i had to fix that now i am separating the mesh hopefully something soon
Ok, I just wanted to make it so I had not forgotten about this!
